text: Hi Everyone! I have a blog template in my theme that has a nice image at the top, but obviously, most clients are wanting to change that. Since its a part of the template, that is not possible unless they clone the theme. Has anyone come up with a decent work around to have a default in a template, but an easy way to update that? I am currently just using a module, which can be edited per post, but not for the listing pages.
